scripts.release: npm run build && cd dist && npm publish && cd ..
scripts.push-build: npm run build && cd dist && yalc push && cd ..
scripts.create-indexes:
create-index -ri --banner "/**
 * @license
 * Copyright Â© 2017-2020 Moov Corporation.  All rights reserved.
 */" src
scripts.clean: mkdir -p dist; cd dist; ls | grep -v 'node_modules\|package-lock.json' | xargs rm -rf; cd ../;
scripts.build: npm run build:prep && NODE_ENV=production npm run build:sources
scripts.build:prep: npm run clean && npm run create-indexes && cp package.json README.md dist
